protein.specific_function: Stress activated, dual specificity kinase that activates the JUN kinases MAPK8/JNK1, MAPK9/JNK2 and MAPK10/JNK3

reference.reference_text: Wu Z, Wu J, Jacinto E, Karin M: Molecular cloning and characterization of human JNKK2, a novel Jun NH2-terminal kinase-specific kinase. Mol Cell Biol. 1997 Dec;17(12):7407-16.

J Biol Chem. 1998 Apr 10;273(15):9344-51.
